meanings.definition: A hot dog topped with chili.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat chilidogs at the baseball game.
meanings.sent2: At the cookout, everyone enjoyed the chilidogs.
meanings.sent3: The chilidogs at the fair were so tasty!
meanings.sent4: The chilidogs were a spicy delight on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The smell of chilidogs cooking made my mouth water.
